mapper.select: select emp_no "emp_no", emp_name "emp_name", emp_eng_name "emp_eng_name", (select d.dep_name from dept d where d.dep_no = dep_no) "dep_name", (select j.jikup from code_jikup where j.jikup_no = jikup_no) "jikup", salary "salary", to_char(hire_dt, 'yyyy-mm-dd') "hire_dt", emp_gender "emp_gender", phone "phone", emp_email "emp_email", emp_email_office "emp_email_office", (select e.emp_name from employee e where e.mgr_emp_no = emp_no) "mgr_emp_name", emp_addr "emp_addr", to_char(emp_resign_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') "emp_resign_date", (select w.worktime_name from code_worktime w where w.worktime_cd = worktime_cd) "worktime", is_on_leave "is_on_leave" from employee
select (select j.jikup from code_jikup j where j.jikup_cd = (select ee.jikup_cd from employee ee where ee.emp_no=e.emp_no) ) "jikup", e.emp_name, trunc(e.salary/12, 5) "salary" from employee e
